name: Molo Mansion Drive
description: Learn comparison operators! Compare distances and values to make decisions.
starter_code:
# Use comparisons to check distances
# Operators: <, >, <=, >=, ==, !=

distance = car.distance_to_destination()
if distance > 100:
    # Far away - go fast!
    pass
hints: Use < (less than) and > (greater than) to compare values
Use <= and >= for 'less/greater than or equal'
Use == to check if values are equal, != for not equal
solution:
distance = car.distance_to_destination()
if distance > 200:
    car.set_speed(2.0)
    car.go()
else:
    car.set_speed(1.0)
    car.go()
